implications.G6PD: At risk of acute hemolytic anemia

drugrecommendation: Rasburicase is contraindicated; alternatives include allopurinol.
comments: Allopurinol is associated with severe cutaneous reactions in the rare carriers of the HLA-B*58:01 allele.

drugrecommendation: To ascertain that G6PD status is normal, enzyme activity must be measured; alternatives include allopurinol.
comments: Allopurinol is associated with severe cutaneous reactions in the rare carriers of the HLA-B*58:01 allele.

implications.G6PD: Low or reduced risk of hemolytic anemia

drugrecommendation: No reason to withhold rasburicase based on G6PD status.
comments: A negative or inconclusive genetic test cannot be assumed to indicate normal G6PD phenotype; an enzyme actiity test is needed to assign G6PD phenotype in such cases.
